marklogic.body: You asked for an address. I gave you the number, they can provide your local address or deliver you there. As for ACA, I'm against it as of yesterday. I don't want one dime of my money going to a bunch of ingrate slippery slope whiners.Â I have great insurance, and when yours is maxed out or you get cancelled, I'll be Glad to pry your precious freedom, and your handgun from your Cold dead hands.Â In the mean time we can all continue to pay for ambulance rides and ER visits to care for the uninsured.Â Just try not to choke on that pizza.
